kpi.name: hlr_1307a

kpi_info.title: Average duration of Sz interface successful operations
kpi_info.use: Indicates the average duration of the successful operations in Sz interface, expressed in milliseconds.
kpi_info.use_experience:
This KPI is similar to msc_1307a. New KPI ID reference.
This new KPI ID reference is to to be used starting from M15.1 report sets.

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: HLR; VIEWID

KPI CLASS: Resource
MEASUREMENT(S): HLR measurement, Sz Interface (M397)

kpi.kpi_alias: Avg Sz succ oper dur HLR
